title: Altar Cover, 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: filet lace, bobbin lace
description: A shaped linen cover in plain white which has a wide border of filet lace in an elaborate, fantastic design of curving vines and flowers with a winged, four-footed beast. Edged with scalloped bobbin lace. The border is backed with course, modern net to protect it.

tombstone.epitaph:
Altar Cover, 17th century. Medium: linen
Technique: filet lace, bobbin lace. 1952-162-123.
